TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UrlEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL.

remarks.format:
## Remarks UrlEditor is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a dialog box for selecting a URL.
## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.ui.design.u_1_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.design.u_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.design.u_1_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog box.
Docs.value: The caption to display on the selection dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that can be used to gain additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
Docs.summary: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object hasn't changed, this method should return the same object it was passed.

Docs.summary: Gets the file name filter string for the editor. This is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.
Docs.value: A string that contains information about the file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Filter property specifies a filter string for all files (*.\*).
A filter string contains one or more filter options. Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar.
The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options:
"`Text Files (*.txt)|*.txt|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies three filter patterns:
"`Text Files(*.txt;*.text;*.lst)|*.txt;*.text;*.lst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that can be used to gain additional context information.
Docs.summary: Gets the editing style of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
Docs.returns: One of the values indicating the provided editing style. If the method is not supported, this method will return .

Docs.summary: Gets the options for the URL builder to use.
Docs.value: A that indicates the options for the URL builder to use.
